subhead: Though medical professionals broadly cite acetaminophen as among the safest painkillers to take during pregnancy, Trump insisted that 'taking Tylenol is not good' for a developing fetus. subhead: Emmanuel Macron is set to deliver his speech recognizing Palestine on September 22 at the UN headquarters in New York. In retaliation, Israel is considering closing the French consulate in Jerusalem and annexing part of the West Bank.

headline: 'He said he would kill me': The femicide of In√®s Mecellem, a crime authorities failed to prevent
subhead: On September 8, the young social worker was stabbed to death by her former partner. Despite five warnings and court-ordered surveillance, her attacker was never taken into custody, and he is still on the run today.

headline: Trump's America pays tribute to 'martyr' Charlie Kirk, blurring politics and religion
subhead: With Donald Trump and JD Vance in attendance, tens of thousands gathered on Sunday near Phoenix to honor the murdered conservative activist in a ceremony that was both a political rally and a crusade against the 'enemies' of the MAGA movement.
